ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQIM: EverQuest Instant Messaging
ygData.msgSnippet: Not a whine...just statement of facts. And it is 13 dollars a month not 10. I have played EQ for over 3 years and have EARNED the right to complain when I do
ygData.messageBody:
Not a whine...just statement of facts. And it is 13 dollars a month not 10. I have played EQ for over 3 years and have EARNED the right to complain when I do not feel something is right. If you do not agree that is fine but don't accuse someone of whining just because you disagree.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: LAINE. Mikael (Nol)
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Sunday, November 03, 2002 1:33 PM
Subject: SV: [EverQuest] EQIM: EverQuest Instant Messaging

Agree, after all, they should be working for free. And don't bring me the "But I already pay jadjada", yeah you pay, yeah you get an online game.
 
$10 for playing a game for a month ain't expensive. If the game keeps you happy, then don't whine about not getting shitz for free. If the game doesn't keep you happy, stop playing or pay more.
 
Both VI and Sony does this to *drum roll* make cash, neither of them is doing it to provide you or me some free fun.
 
What bugs me is people who pay for a product to be able to whine about it.
 
Oh, and don't bother telling me that you can whine all you want, yes you can but so can I.
-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: Orion [mailto:orionv@...]
Skickat: den 3 november 2002 18:34
Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Ämne: Re: [EverQuest] EQIM: EverQuest Instant Messaging

That is just semantics....Verant/Sony all the same thing. They have become nothing but a bunch of money grubbers that really don't care about the EQ1 players anymore.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Toni
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, November 03, 2002 10:08 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQIM: EverQuest Instant Messaging

As you may/may not have noticed,  Verants name is nowhere to be found inthe intro anymore.  also,  it is nowhere to be found on the PoP box either.  So,  don't blame Verant,  blame Sony.

~Katashaka Naboombu

 Orion <orionv@...> wrote:

Jaggedpine was months ago and yes to all the rest but what have they done for us lately. They led everyone to believe that all the /raid stuff would be free then bam you have to buy POP to get it. New bought spells in POP are Nodrop,etc.. Getting really tired of Verants attitude.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Matthew Bond
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, November 03, 2002 12:46 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQIM: EverQuest Instant Messaging

Orion wrote:
> It is a good concept but I am not willing to pay for it. Verant
> doesn't give anything away anymore. No new zones,no raid channel
> nothing.

They do give us new zones for free occasionally... Jaggedpine Forest was
a free download on the optional patch only a few months ago. About a
year ago there was The Warrens and Stonebrunt Mountains, and before that
we had Paineel and The Hole.

Honig Wayfarer
54 Ranger
Cazic Thule
